title: "Legendary Pursuit" mission
body:
My husband and I have played games to do all of our missions together.

He has "Legendary Pursuit" completed and I do not?
( That's the one where you have to complete 6 more Worlds Missions )

Wat?

replies.body: Hello, i have absolutely the same issue - i have bought the master pass, same as my friends - we all have completed ALL the available missions, but i have 5/6 completed missions on Legendary pursuit mission, but my friends have completed it already , and have opened an orb. What is going on. I dont want to wait another week for another pack of missions in odrder to complete this mission 1 week later. And probably in the end im going to be - 1 mission, so i wouldnt be able to take everything from the Masster pass i have bought with REAL MONEY.

Hey, I looked into this for you and do see you've completed quite a handful of missions.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can dig deeper and get this resolved for you.  You can also reach out to us via support@riotgames.com.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=TmkWlskF,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2017-10-04T15:20:23.096+0000)
>
> Hey, I looked into this for you and do see you've completed quite a handful of missions.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can dig deeper and get this resolved for you.  You can also reach out to us via support@riotgames.com.

Thank you very much for the quick reply. =)

> [{quoted}](name=demonical rage,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=TmkWlskF,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-04T05:43:15.711+0000)
>
> Hello, i have absolutely the same issue - i have bought the master pass, same as my friends - we all have completed ALL the available missions, but i have 5/6 completed missions on Legendary pursuit mission, but my friends have completed it already , and have opened an orb. What is going on. I dont want to wait another week for another pack of missions in odrder to complete this mission 1 week later. And probably in the end im going to be - 1 mission, so i wouldnt be able to take everything from the Masster pass i have bought with REAL MONEY.

I cannot even submit a ticket since Riot support system with tickets is not working for more than 30 hours now. Great. I am so glad i bought the master pass with real money, so i have to wait 1 more week than all of my friends in order to get the same content we ALL HAVE PAID FOR.
Do you have a screenshot?  I looked into this for you, and I see that you are 5/6 completed in Legendary Pursuit.  :O  Have you restarted your client yet?

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=TmkWlskF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-03T17:52:52.907+0000)
>
> Do you have a screenshot?  I looked into this for you, and I see that you are 5/6 completed in Legendary Pursuit.  :O  Have you restarted your client yet?

Yeah I've restarted my client a few times since this happened.

I can see that for some reason it did my "complete 4 more missions" later than it completed my husband's, but we played and did the Pick Em at the same time.

http://purinbo.net/storage/0missions.png
http://purinbo.net/storage/missions.png

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=TmkWlskF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-03T17:52:52.907+0000)
>
> Do you have a screenshot?  I looked into this for you, and I see that you are 5/6 completed in Legendary Pursuit.  :O  Have you restarted your client yet?

sounds like the cable or internet provider 's answer - restart the router. They never call You back again after that.
